landing.title: Discover all about football
landing.desc: Welcome to the ultimate football experience at BallHola! Secure your spot on the field, connect with fellow players, and dive into the game. Ready to play? Let's start.

game.cancellation_policy_info: Cancel within 24 hours before the game for a refund, excluding advance payment. No refund within one hour of the game if paid in advance. Unpaid bookings cannot be canceled; payment required for confirmation
game.info_uniforms: You will receive the final information about the color of the uniform when all the participants have voted. You will receive a message within at least 24 hours of starting the match.
game.your_booking_canceled: Your booking has been canceled successfully
game.extended_successfully: the football match organized by you will continue until
game.extended_title: The same match has been successfully extended.

user.name: Name
user.delete_account_title: Once you delete your account, there is no getting it back. Make sure you want to do this.

success.title: Your booking has been successfully completed

create_game.title: Let's create a game
create_game.asking: Have you already made a booking by calling, same day, same time, same place?
create_game.info: Before creating a game, make sure that you have booked a room in advance and the stadium knows about it.
create_game.price_info: If the payment will be made by the organization, you may not specify the amount.

invitation.title: Invitation for private match
invitation.info: Dear {{name}}, you have a private match playing invitation from {{from}}, for {{date}}, at the {{stadion}}.
invitation.game_info: You have an invitation to a football match on {{date}}, at {{startTime}}-{{endTime}} in the {{title}}
invitation.group_info: You have an invitation to the group {{title}}.

terms_and_conditions.title: Terms and Conditions
terms_and_conditions.p: Welcome to BallHola! These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your use of our mobile application ("BallHola" or the "App"). By downloading, installing, or using the App, you agree to comply with these Terms. If you do not agree with these Terms, please do not use the App.
terms_and_conditions.p1: Eligibility: You must be at least 13 years old to use BallHola. By using the App, you confirm that you meet this age requirement.
terms_and_conditions.p2: Account Registration: To access certain features, you may be required to create an account. You agree to provide accurate and up-to-date information and to maintain the security of your account.
terms_and_conditions.p3: Prohibited Activities: You agree not to:
terms_and_conditions.p3-1: 1. Use the App for any illegal or unauthorized purpose.
terms_and_conditions.p3-2: 2. Interfere with the security or functionality of the App.
terms_and_conditions.p3-3: 3. Violate the rights of other users, including by engaging in abusive or harmful behavior.
terms_and_conditions.title3-item: All content and materials within the App, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, and software, are the property of BallHola  or its licensors. You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, and non-transferable license to use the App for personal, non-commercial purposes. Any unauthorized use of the App's content may result in termination of your access to the App.
terms_and_conditions.title4-item: If you submit content (such as comments, photos, or videos) through the App, you grant BallHola  a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, modify, and distribute your content. You are responsible for the content you submit, and it must not violate any laws or third-party rights.
terms_and_conditions.title5-item: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the App at any time, for any reason, including violation of these Terms. Upon termination, your rights to use the App will cease immediately.
terms_and_conditions.title6-item: To the maximum extent permitted by law, BallHola  and its affiliates will not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising out of or related to your use of the App. Our total liability to you for any claims arising from the App will not exceed the amount you paid, if any, to use the App.
terms_and_conditions.title7-item: The App is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. We do not warrant that the App will be uninterrupted, error-free, or free from viruses. Your use of the App is at your own risk.
terms_and_conditions.title8-item: These Terms are governed by the laws of Armenia. Any disputes arising under or in connection with these Terms will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Armenia.
terms_and_conditions.title9-item: We may modify these Terms from time to time. Any changes will be effective when posted within the App. Continued use of the App after changes constitutes your acceptance of the updated Terms.
terms_and_conditions.title10-item: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.p: At BallHola, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share your personal information when you use our mobile application ("BallHola" or the "App"). By using the App, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.
privacy_policy.title2_p: We collect various types of information to provide and improve our services:
privacy_policy.p1: Personal Information: When you register or interact with our App, we may collect personally identifiable information such as your name, email address, phone number, and location.
privacy_policy.p2: Usage Data: We automatically collect information about your usage of the App, such as pages viewed, features used, and time spent on the app.
privacy_policy.p3: Device Information: We collect information about the device you use to access the App, including device type, operating system, and unique device identifiers.
privacy_policy.p4: Cookies and Tracking Technologies: We may use cookies and similar technologies to collect information about how you use the App and to improve the user experience.
privacy_policy.title3-item: We use the collected data for the following purposes:
privacy_policy.p3-1: To provide and maintain our services.
privacy_policy.p3-2: To notify you about changes to our App
privacy_policy.p3-3: To allow you to participate in interactive features.
privacy_policy.p3-5: To analyze usage and improve our services.
privacy_policy.p3-6: To communicate with you for promotional purposes (with your consent).
privacy_policy.p3-7: To prevent fraud and ensure security.
privacy_policy.title4-item: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your data with trusted third-party service providers to help us provide our services, including:
privacy_policy.title4-p2: Business partners in connection with joint services.
privacy_policy.title4-p3: Legal authorities, if required by law or to protect our rights.
privacy_policy.title5-item: We take the security of your data seriously and use reasonable measures to protect it. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to protect your data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.
privacy_policy.title6-item: We will retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy, or as required by law.
privacy_policy.title7-item: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal data, including the right to access, correct, or delete your information. To exercise your rights, please contact us at
privacy_policy.title8-item: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date. Continued use of the App after changes constitutes your consent to the new policy.
privacy_policy.title9-item: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at
